findings.title: Asset Consistency Enforcement in WithdrawVault
findings.description: The asset consistency can be better enforced in the related contracts: CgUSD, WithdrawVault, and WithdrawQueue by explicitly enforcing their assets are identical.

findings.title: Revisited Caller Validation in Burner
findings.description: The `Burner` contract has two functions (`requestBurnMyStTokenForCover()` and `requestBurnMyStToken()`) that can relax their access control restriction, avoiding caller verification guarded with the `requiresAuth` modifier.

findings.title: Trust Issue of Admin Keys
findings.description: In the Cygnus protocol, there is a privileged account (owner). This account plays critical roles in governing and regulating the protocol-wide operations.

findings.title: Revisited Bunker Mode Design in WithdrawQueue
findings.description: The exact consequence of enabling or disabling the `bunker` mode remains unclear in the `WithdrawQueue` contract.
